articles.author: Ramishah Maruf
articles.title: America’s biggest private company is laying off thousands of workers - CNN
articles.description: Cargill, the megasized Minnesota-based food production giant, is laying off about 5% of its global workforce as food commodity prices drop.
articles.content:
Cargill, the megasized Minnesota-based food production giant, is laying off about 5% of its global workforce as food commodity prices drop.
Cargill is Americas largest privately held company, accord… [+1613 chars]
